name: Puzzletron
description:
Enter the Puzzletron 

The year is 3042, the humanity that we know has been long forgotten. It transformed itself into an amorph energy life form, fueled by curiosity and, an insatiable hunger to decode the chaos.  

You're now in the puzzletron, child. Hush! you need to solve the problems of the universe.

Understand the Puzzletron

Puzzletron is a simple puzzle editor where you can build and play your own levels!

- The actor is a life form that can be moved
- The win condition is to place all actors inside a golden goal.
- Obstacles prevent actors from moving, spikes kill the actors.
- You must have at least one actor to simulate an universe


Control the Puzzletron   Move BrushArrow KeysChange BrushZ KeyPaint TileX KeySelect Element on HUDZ or X Keys

Run the simulation on full screen to enchance the experience:

Boot -> Right corner of the game -> Double square icon.
